activities: A business to business invoice exchange company that facilitates payments amongst businesses. Currently Viewpost is in a soft release meaning customers are onboarded by a dedicated business representative.  Viewpost is a business to business payment facilitation company.  Our terms and conditions do not allow personal customers or businesses  located outside the US to join.  In its current state, Viewpost customers may upload files that could potentially contain data on individuals within the EU.  Depending on how the business is set up, we may collect individual name , address and transactional detail.  Over the next 12-18 months Viewpost will begin to onboard personal customers in the US and personal and business customers in the EU.  At that time we will could collect name, address and account number and credit card data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: individual name , address, account number, and transactional detail.
